item.title: Robanne add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Robanne add a quote by Ann Richards
item.description: "After all, Ginger Rogers did everything that Fred Astaire did. She just did it backwards and in high heels." -- Ann Richards

item.title: Robanne add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
